00030 #ifdef TOON_TYPEOF_DECLTYPE
00031     #define TOON_TYPEOF(X) decltype((X))
00032 #elif defined TOON_TYPEOF_TYPEOF
00033     #define TOON_TYPEOF(X) typeof((X))
00034 #elif defined TOON_TYPEOF___TYPEOF__
00035     #define TOON_TYPEOF(X) __typeof__((X))
00036 #elif defined TOON_TYPEOF_BOOST
00037     #include <boost/typeof/typeof.hpp>
00038     #define TOON_TYPEOF(X) BOOST_TYPEOF((X))
00039 #else
00040     #include <complex>
00041     namespace TooN{
00042         namespace Internal{
00043             #include <TooN/internal/builtin_typeof.h>
00044         }
00045     }
00046     #define TOON_TYPEOF(X) typename Internal::DeEnumerate<sizeof Internal::enumerate(X)>::type
00047 #endif
